verses.verse: To the chief Musician, <S%H5329><s%> A Psalm <S%H4210><s%> of David. <S%H1732><s%> Blessed <S%H835><s%> is he that considereth <S%H7919><s%> <S%H413><s%> the poor: <S%H1800><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will deliver <S%H4422><s%> him in time <S%H3117><s%> of trouble. <S%H7451><s%>

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> will preserve <S%H8104><s%> him, and keep him alive; <S%H2421><s%> and he shall be blessed <S%H833><s%> upon the earth: <S%H776><s%> and thou wilt not <S%H408><s%> deliver <S%H5414><s%> him unto the will <S%H5315><s%> of his enemies. <S%H341><s%>

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> will strengthen <S%H5582><s%> him upon <S%H5921><s%> the bed <S%H6210><s%> of languishing: <S%H1741><s%> thou wilt make <S%H2015><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> his bed <S%H4904><s%> in his sickness. <S%H2483><s%>
I <S%H589><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> LORD, <S%H3068><s%> be merciful <S%H2603><s%> unto me: heal <S%H7495><s%> my soul; <S%H5315><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> I have sinned <S%H2398><s%> against thee.
Mine enemies <S%H341><s%> speak <S%H559><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> of me, When <S%H4970><s%> shall he die, <S%H4191><s%> and his name <S%H8034><s%> perish? <S%H6><s%>

And if <S%H518><s%> he come <S%H935><s%> to see <S%H7200><s%> me, he speaketh <S%H1696><s%> vanity: <S%H7723><s%> his heart <S%H3820><s%> gathereth <S%H6908><s%> iniquity <S%H205><s%> to itself; when he goeth <S%H3318><s%> abroad, <S%H2351><s%> he telleth <S%H1696><s%> it.
All <S%H3605><s%> that hate <S%H8130><s%> me whisper <S%H3907><s%> together <S%H3162><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> me: against <S%H5921><s%> me do they devise <S%H2803><s%> my hurt. <S%H7451><s%>

An evil <S%H1100><s%> disease, <S%H1697><s%> say they, cleaveth fast <S%H3332><s%> unto him: and now that <S%H834><s%> he lieth <S%H7901><s%> he shall rise up <S%H6965><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> more. <S%H3254><s%>

Yea, <S%H1571><s%> mine own familiar friend, <S%H7965><s%> <S%H376><s%> in whom <S%H834><s%> I trusted, <S%H982><s%> which did eat <S%H398><s%> of my bread, <S%H3899><s%> hath lifted up <S%H1431><s%> his heel <S%H6119><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> me.
But thou, <S%H859><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> be merciful <S%H2603><s%> unto me, and raise me up, <S%H6965><s%> that I may requite <S%H7999><s%> them.

By this <S%H2063><s%> I know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> thou favorest <S%H2654><s%> me, because <S%H3588><s%> mine enemy <S%H341><s%> doth not <S%H3808><s%> triumph <S%H7321><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> me.
And as for me, <S%H589><s%> thou upholdest <S%H8551><s%> me in mine integrity, <S%H8537><s%> and settest <S%H5324><s%> me before thy face <S%H6440><s%> forever. <S%H5769><s%>

Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> from everlasting, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5769><s%> and to <S%H5704><s%> everlasting. <S%H5769><s%> Amen, <S%H543><s%> and Amen. <S%H543><s%>
